content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'll definitely check out those resources. I'm particularly interested in making soap bars with natural ingredients, so I'll look into those recipes first. By the way, I have to say, I was really impressed by the organizers of the Spring Fling Market, they did a great job of arranging the vendors in a visually appealing way, and I was happy to share a table with my friend Emily who was selling her handmade candles.
